data.title: 7 U.S. Banks That Will Need to Hold More Regulatory Capital
data.text: The Fed recently released the new required common equity tier 1 capital ratios for the largest banks, and many saw increases.

data.title: Why This Low-Rate Environment Is Even More Difficult for Banks
data.text: Normally in a low-rate environment, banks are able to lend more, but that's not the case right now.

data.title: Fed States Capital Requirements for Banks Amid Coronavirus Scare
data.text: The central bank has calculated capital buffers for individual banks based on their performance in the 2020 stress test, with a view to avoid any economic downturn.
